artifacts/Lalit/send,transfer,call theor.content:
// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0

pragma solidity >=0.5.0 <0.8.0;

/* kisi account se kisi contract or address me ether bheje ke liye payable, fallback, receive use karte hai
and kisi contract se kisi account me or kisi dusre contract me ether send karne ke liye 
send, transfer, call use karte hai.

send function :isme return bool hota hai, and transction success hone par true return hota hai 
limit : 2300 gas, gas cost max.
yadi transaction false ho gya to gas puri use kar leta hai, remaning gas revert use nahi karta hai.and 
yadi state variable me change hua ho to use bhi revert nahi karta hai 
so not use send function , if send function ko use karna bhi ho to require ka use kare, jisme condition 
lagaye ki transaction ki gas cost 2300 gas se kam hai ya nahi. 

transfer function: gas limit 2300, no any return value
yadi transcation fail ho jati hai yah remaning gas and state variablechange 


*/
